detail_desc: Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and print motifs front and back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and print motifs front and back.
Briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide, foldover edge at the waist and soft, narrow elastic trims at round the legs.

T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Three printed and two in a solid colour.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric. Regular waist with covered elastication and tapered legs with sewn-in creases and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with inset mesh sections. High waist with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Rattle in a soft knit in the shape of a teddy bear. Polyester padding. Width approx. 9 cm. Length approx. 13 cm.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with covered elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with a peplum.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with covered elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with a peplum.

Nursing jumper in an airy, fine knit with a unique nursing feature, round neck and long sleeves. Inner top in jersey with a woven lower section. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Dress with a bodice in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend and flared skirt in glittery tulle. Press-stud on one shoulder and short raglan sleeves. Lined skirt.
Dress in a cotton weave with a small V-neck opening and buttons at the front. Gathers around the neckline, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and gathered tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut satin blouse with a boat neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with metal buttons.
Straight-cut satin blouse with a boat neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with metal buttons.

Single-breasted coat in recycled wool and recycled polyester with notch lapels. Chest pocket, diagonal welt side pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Coat in a felted wool blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs, a concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Diagonal side pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled and the polyester is partly recycled.

Coat in a felted wool blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs, a concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Diagonal side pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled and the polyester is partly recycled.
